Analysis of gender biases in EcoEncontros seminar series, Graduate Program in Ecology at the University of São Paulo. 

The present website/repository contains data, metadata, and modeling analysis source codes necessary to reproduce the EcoEncontros gender bias results.

The preprint is published at EcoEvoRxiv: https://doi.org/10.32942/X25607. Submitted for recommendation to Peer Community in Ecology.

The same repository is stored at Zenodo with the reference and DOI:

Melina de Souza Leite, & Rodrigues Barreto, J. (2024). Data and Code from: Is the audience gender-blind? Smaller audience in female talks highlights prestige differences in academia (v0.9.9). Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.11288110


[Melina Leite](https://melinaleite.weebly.com/) and [Júlia Barreto](barretoj@usp.br)
